title: Traveller

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Each night, visit a player's house and give them a souvenir. Souvenirs may be used in the mentioned phase and the player can multitask it.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You can't give more than one souvenir to a person and you can never self-target. You may only give each souvenir once.
- You will learn the faction of people who you visit.
- This role can't spawn if there are more than 4 factions.
- Souvenirs:
> Wooden Ornmanets: The player will gain Powerful defence during the night it's used.
> Glass Pegasus: When used during the night, the player will be able to read whispers during the next day.
> Cookies: When used during the day, the player's vote will count as 2.
> World Map: The player will learn who visited them during the night it's used.
> Novel: When used during the night on a specific target, the player will find the target's role.
> Chocolate: When used during the night, the player will become lynchproof during the next day.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Give one souvenir to a member of every faction in the game including Neutrals.
